Html: Hello, I have tried each overload of the TaskEventLog constructor, but each variation returns no results. I know this cannot be true as when I look at the event history in Task Scheduler, there are all kinds of rows there. I also tried using CorrelatedTaskEventLog, but when I tried enumerating the results from that, it timed out. Is this simply a permissions thing? I don't see why though as the user I'm logging in with has administrator rights. Thanks in advance for any assistance anyone can provide.
Due to UAC, you may need to run your code as administrator in order to see the listing.
